resume_text:
TISHA VARMA
Ahmedabad, India | Phone: +919377251777 | Email: varmatisha0@gmail.com | GitHub: https://github.com/tisha-varma |
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tisha-varma/ | LeetCode: https://leetcode.com/u/_tisha_2810/
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
AI Engineer with hands-on experience building LLM-powered and agentic AI systems using Python. Skilled in agent orchestration,
embeddings, prompt engineering, and backend API development. Built multi-agent workflows, resume analysis systems, and computer
vision applications. Strong builder mindset with hackathon wins and consistent DSA practice.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Programming: Python, Java, Solidity
AI & LLMs: LLMs, Agentic AI, Prompt Engineering, NLP, Embeddings, RAG concepts, Computer Vision, OCR
Agent Frameworks: CrewAI, Multi-agent workflows
Backend & Tools: FastAPI, Flask, REST APIs, Git, Async Python basics
Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Vector DB concepts
AI Coding Tools: Codex, Claude Code, Cursor, Antigravity, GitHub Copilot
PROJECTS
Career Copilot AI – Resume & Job Description Analysis Platform
● Technologies: Python, FastAPI, NLP, LLMs, Embeddings, ATS Parsing
● Built an AI-based system to analyze resumes against job descriptions and highlight skill gaps and keyword mismatches.
● Implemented resume parsing and JD processing pipelines to extract skills, experience, and role requirements.
● Generated ATS-aware resume improvement suggestions using LLMs and developed RESTful backend APIs using FastAPI.
Smart Multi-Agent Daily Planner (Agentic AI – Kaggle Project)
● Technologies: Python, CrewAI, LLMs
● Built a multi-agent AI workflow using Large Language Models that reduced manual planning effort by ~60%.
HerDefenders – AI-Powered Women’s Safety System (SSIP Approved Startup Project)
● Technologies: Python, Machine Learning, OpenCV, CCTV Analytics
● Developed real-time threat detection using computer vision and CCTV footage analytics.
PharmaMate – OCR-Based Medication Assistant
● Technologies: Python, OCR, Machine Learning
● Built an OCR pipeline to extract text from handwritten medical prescriptions.
● Automated dosage interpretation to reduce manual reading errors.
EXPERIENCE
Machine Learning Intern | InfoLabz IT Services Pvt. Ltd. | Jul 2023 – Sep 2023
● Supported development of machine learning workflows and Python-based automation
● Worked with OpenCV on image processing tasks and experimentation
Open Source Contributor | GitHub
● Implemented features, fixed bugs, and improved documentation through code contributions and pull requests in open-source
repositories.
PROBLEM SOLVING & DATA STRUCTURES | LeetCode, GeeksforGeeks.
● Solved 150+ algorithmic problems using Python. [Arrays, Strings, Stacks, Queues, Trees, Graphs]
ACHIEVEMENTS
● Winner – HackSprint Hackathon (2026) | Google Developer Groups on Campus, SSIU
● Finalist – Google Girl Hackathon 2025
● Finalist – Tic Tech Toe Hackathon, DAIICT (2025) and Hackathon Grand Finale (SSIP + Gujarat Knowledge Society)
EDUCATION & TRAINING
Bachelor of Engineering – Information Technology | L.D. College of Engineering | 2024 – 2027 | CGPA: 9.2/ 10
Diploma – Information Technology | Gujarat Technological University | 2021 – 2024 | CGPA: 9.7 / 10
Agentic AI – 5 Day Intensive Course | Kaggle × Google

strengths: Strong programming skills in Python and Java
Experience with backend API development and database management
Proven problem-solving skills through LeetCode and hackathon participation
Ability to work on multi-agent workflows and computer vision applications

core: Deep Learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
Cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure

roadmap.skill: Deep Learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
roadmap.expected_outcome: Design and implement deep learning models using TensorFlow or PyTorch to solve complex problems in AI

roadmap.skill: Cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure
roadmap.expected_outcome: Deploy and manage AI models on cloud platforms, ensuring scalability and reliability
Containerize AI applications using Docker, ensuring efficient deployment and management
Orchestrate containerized AI applications using Kubernetes, ensuring automated deployment and scaling
Implement DevOps practices to streamline AI development, testing, and deployment, ensuring collaboration and efficiency

analysis.analysis_notes: The candidate has a strong foundation in AI and Machine Learning with expertise in Python, Java, and relevant tools like LLMs and OpenCV. However, they lack experience with deep learning frameworks and cloud platforms, which are essential for an AI Engineer role. With some additional learning and experience, the candidate can fill these gaps and become a strong fit for the position.

reflection.reason: The provided role fit score of 80 indicates a strong alignment with the target role of AI Engineer, and the 5 learning roadmap items offer a clear direction for addressing existing skill gaps, suggesting the guidance is adequate for the candidate's development.

youtube_recommendations.skill: Deep Learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
Cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure

job_tips: Tailor your resume for each application
Follow up after submitting your application

technical.question: Tell me about your technical background.
How do you approach learning new technologies?
Describe a challenging project you worked on.
technical.tip: Use STAR method and highlight your contributions.

behavioral.question: Why are you interested in this role?
behavioral.tip: Connect your skills to the job requirements.

behavioral.question: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

interview_tips: Research the company before the interview
Prepare questions to ask the interviewer
Use the STAR method for behavioral questions
Practice coding problems if it's a technical role
Follow up with a thank-you email within 24 hours

job_strategy.elevator_pitch: As a seasoned AI Engineer with expertise in building LLM-powered systems, I leverage my skills in prompt engineering, embeddings, and multi-agent workflows to drive innovative solutions, such as my Career Copilot AI project, which analyzes resumes against job descriptions using NLP and LLMs. With a strong background in Python, Java, and AI frameworks like CrewAI, I excel in developing AI-driven applications. My experience in computer vision and OCR technologies has also enabled me to develop real-time threat detection systems and medication assistants.

top_selling_points.point: Developed a resume analysis platform using LLMs and NLP, extracting skills and experience to provide ATS-aware resume improvement suggestions
top_selling_points.how_to_use: Emphasize the project's impact on streamlining recruitment processes and highlight the technical skills used, such as Python, FastAPI, and embeddings, to demonstrate expertise in AI-powered solutions

top_selling_points.point: Built a multi-agent AI workflow using Large Language Models, reducing manual planning effort by ~60%
top_selling_points.how_to_use: Quantify the benefits of the project, such as increased efficiency and productivity, and explain how the technical skills used, like CrewAI and LLMs, can be applied to other complex problems

top_selling_points.point: Developed real-time threat detection using computer vision and CCTV footage analytics for the HerDefenders project
top_selling_points.how_to_use: Highlight the project's social impact and showcase the technical skills used, such as Python, OpenCV, and machine learning, to demonstrate expertise in computer vision and AI-powered safety systems

target_companies.why: These companies would value my expertise in building innovative AI-powered solutions, such as LLM-based systems and computer vision applications, to drive business growth and competitiveness

My experience in developing AI-driven applications, such as multi-agent workflows and OCR-based systems, would be highly relevant to big tech companies looking to integrate AI into their products and services
My skills in NLP, LLMs, and computer vision could be applied to develop AI-powered solutions for fintech companies, such as automating document processing or enhancing customer service with chatbots

networking_tips: Attend AI and machine learning conferences, such as NeurIPS or IJCAI, to connect with professionals working in the field and learn about the latest developments and trends
Join online communities, like Kaggle or GitHub, to collaborate with other developers and engineers on AI-powered projects and share knowledge and expertise
Reach out to professionals working in AI startups or big tech companies, such as Google or Amazon, to learn about their experiences and gain insights into the industry

application_strategy.customize_for: Each company's specific AI-related challenges and initiatives, such as developing AI-powered chatbots or enhancing computer vision capabilities
application_strategy.highlight_project: Career Copilot AI, as it demonstrates my ability to develop innovative AI-powered solutions that can be applied to various industries, such as recruitment or customer service
application_strategy.address_gaps: By highlighting my enthusiasm for learning and growing, and emphasizing my experience with related technologies, such as Python and machine learning, to demonstrate my potential to quickly adapt to new tools and frameworks, like TensorFlow or PyTorch
